statements: SELECT * FROM crop_diseases;
SELECT crop_name, disease_name, disease_severity FROM crop_diseases WHERE crop_id = 3;
SELECT crop_name, disease_severity, last_occurrence_date FROM crop_diseases WHERE disease_severity > 5;
SELECT crop_name, disease_name FROM crop_diseases WHERE last_occurrence_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM crop_diseases ORDER BY disease_severity DESC, last_occurrence_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM crop_diseases WHERE crop_name = 'Tomato'
SELECT crop_name, disease_name, disease_severity FROM crop_diseases ORDER BY disease_severity DESC
SELECT crop_name, disease_name, last_occurrence_date FROM crop_diseases WHERE last_occurrence_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_occurrence_date
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Number_of_Diseases FROM crop_diseases GROUP BY crop_name
SELECT crop_name, SUM(disease_severity) AS Total_Severity FROM crop_diseases GROUP BY crop_name ORDER BY Total_Severity DESC
SELECT * FROM crop_diseases;
SELECT disease_name, crop_affected FROM crop_diseases WHERE disease_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM preventive_measures WHERE effectivity_rating > 8;
SELECT disease_name, crop_affected, date_discovered FROM crop_diseases ORDER BY date_discovered DESC;
SELECT measure_name, recommended_crop FROM preventive_measures WHERE effectivity_rating <= 5;
SELECT * FROM crop_diseases WHERE crop_affected='Potato' ORDER BY date_discovered DESC, disease_name ASC
SELECT disease_name, crop_affected FROM crop_diseases WHERE disease_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT disease_id, disease_name, crop_affected, date_discovered FROM crop_diseases WHERE crop_affected='Wheat' AND date_discovered >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT measure_name, recommended_crop FROM preventive_measures WHERE effectivity_rating > 3 ORDER BY measure_name ASC
SELECT * FROM crop_diseases WHERE disease_name LIKE '%rust%' AND crop_affected='Tomato' ORDER BY disease_name DESC
SELECT * FROM crop_diseases;
SELECT disease_name, crop_affected FROM crop_diseases WHERE crop_affected='Potato';
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT disease_name, preventive_measures FROM crop_diseases JOIN preventive_measures ON crop_diseases.disease_id = preventive_measures.disease_id;
SELECT disease_name, count(h.data_id) AS num_records FROM crop_diseases c JOIN historical_data h ON c.disease_id = h.disease_id GROUP BY disease_name HAVING num_records > 1;
SELECT * FROM crop_diseases WHERE crop_affected = 'Potato';
SELECT disease_name, disease_symptoms FROM crop_diseases WHERE disease_name LIKE '%blight%';
SELECT disease_name, crop_affected FROM crop_diseases ORDER BY disease_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(affected_area) AS max_affected_area FROM historical_data;
SELECT disease_name, measure_description FROM crop_diseases JOIN preventive_measures ON crop_diseases.disease_id = preventive_measures.disease_id;
SELECT * FROM crop_diseases;
SELECT disease_name, crop_name FROM crop_diseases WHERE affected_area > 100;
SELECT disease_id, crop_name, reported_date FROM crop_diseases WHERE disease_name = 'Leaf Spot';
SELECT * FROM preventive_measures WHERE application_date <= '2023-01-31';
SELECT source_name, description FROM data_sources WHERE data_type = 'Weather Data';
SELECT * FROM crop_diseases ORDER BY disease_name DESC;
SELECT disease_name, COUNT(*) FROM crop_diseases GROUP BY disease_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT d.*, p.* FROM crop_diseases AS d INNER JOIN preventive_measures AS p ON d.crop_name = p.recommended_crop;
SELECT dr.reported_by, COUNT(dr.report_id) AS num_reports FROM disease_reports AS dr GROUP BY dr.reported_by ORDER BY num_reports DESC;
SELECT d.*, ds.source_name FROM crop_diseases AS d LEFT JOIN data_sources AS ds ON d.crop_name = ds.description;
SELECT * FROM DiseaseCases WHERE severity > 5
SELECT disease_name, location FROM DiseaseCases WHERE id = 100
SELECT id, disease_name, date FROM DiseaseCases ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM PreventiveMeasures WHERE disease_name = 'Influenza'
SELECT location_name, region FROM Locations WHERE country = 'USA'
SELECT * FROM DiseaseCases ORDER BY severity DESC, date ASC
SELECT disease_name, location FROM DiseaseCases WHERE severity > 5
SELECT d.disease_name, d.description, p.preventive_measure FROM Diseases d JOIN PreventiveMeasures p ON d.disease_name = p.disease_name

SELECT dc.disease_name, l.location_name, r.report_date FROM DiseaseReports r JOIN DiseaseCases dc ON r.disease_id = dc.id JOIN Locations l ON r.location_id = l.id WHERE r.report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT d.disease_name, COUNT(dc.id) AS total_cases FROM Diseases d JOIN DiseaseCases dc ON d.disease_name = dc.disease_name GROUP BY d.disease_name
